Source: https://ratatui.rs/showcase/third-party-widgets

# Third Party Widgets Showcase

To add your widgets to this list, please read the
[Third Party Widgets README](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui-website/blob/main/code/showcase/widget-showcase-third-party/README.md)

## Ratatui-image [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/ratatui-image) [Docs](https://docs.rs/ratatui-image) [GitHub](https://github.com/benjajaja/ratatui-image)

[Section titled “Ratatui-image ”](#ratatui-image--)

[`ratatui-image`](https://crates.io/crates/ratatui-image) is an image widget with multiple graphics
protocol backends (sixel, iTerm2, kitty, etc).

## Throbber-widgets-tui [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/throbber-widgets-tui) [Docs](https://docs.rs/throbber-widgets-tui) [GitHub](https://github.com/arkbig/throbber-widgets-tui)

[Section titled “Throbber-widgets-tui ”](#throbber-widgets-tui--)

[`throbber-widgets-tui`](https://crates.io/crates/throbber-widgets-tui) is a widget that displays
throbber. Also-known-as an activity indicator, progress bar, loading icon, spinner,
or ぐるぐる (guru guru).

## Tui-big-text [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-big-text) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-big-text) [GitHub](https://github.com/joshka/tui-big-text)

[Section titled “Tui-big-text ”](#tui-big-text--)

[`tui-big-text`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-big-text) is a rust crate that renders large pixel
text as a widget using the glyphs from the [font8x8](https://crates.io/crates/font8x8) crate.

## Tui-checkbox [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-checkbox) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-checkbox) [GitHub](https://github.com/sorinirimies/tui-checkbox)

[Section titled “Tui-checkbox ”](#tui-checkbox--)

[`tui-checkbox`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-checkbox) is a customizable checkbox widget with
support for custom styling, symbols (unicode, emoji, ASCII), and optional block wrappers.

## Tui-logger [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-logger) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-logger) [GitHub](https://github.com/gin66/tui-logger)

[Section titled “Tui-logger ”](#tui-logger--)

[`tui-logger`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-logger) is widget for capturing and displaying logs.

## Tui-menu [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-menu) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-menu) [GitHub](https://github.com/shuoli84/tui-menu)

[Section titled “Tui-menu ”](#tui-menu--)

[`tui-menu`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-menu) is a menu widget that renders nestable menus.

## Tui-nodes [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-nodes) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-nodes) [Sourcehut](https://git.sr.ht/~jaxter184/tui-nodes)

[Section titled “Tui-nodes ”](#tui-nodes--)

[`tui-nodes`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-nodes) is a Node graph visualization widget.

## Tui-piechart [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-piechart) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-piechart) [GitHub](https://github.com/sorinirimies/tui-piechart)

[Section titled “Tui-piechart ”](#tui-piechart--)

[`tui-piechart`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-piechart) is a versatile piechart widget that comes in
both a standard and high resolution with a large set of predefined symbols and the ability to add
custom ones.

## Tui-scrollview [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-scrollview) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-scrollview) [GitHub](https://github.com/joshka/tui-scrollview)

[Section titled “Tui-scrollview ”](#tui-scrollview--)

[`tui-scrollview`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-scrollview) is a widget for creating scrollable
views.

## Tui-term [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-term) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-term) [GitHub](https://github.com/a-kenji/tui-term)

[Section titled “Tui-term ”](#tui-term--)

[`tui-term`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-term) is a pseudoterminal widget.

## Tui-textarea [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-textarea) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-textarea) [GitHub](https://github.com/rhysd/tui-textarea)

[Section titled “Tui-textarea ”](#tui-textarea--)

[`tui-textarea`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-textarea) is a simple yet powerful text editor widget
like `&#x3C;textarea>` in HTML for ratatui and tui-rs. Multi-line text editor can be easily put as part
of your TUI application.

## Tui-tree-widget [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-tree-widget) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-tree-widget) [GitHub](https://github.com/EdJoPaTo/tui-rs-tree-widget)

[Section titled “Tui-tree-widget ”](#tui-tree-widget--)

[`tui-tree-widget`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-tree-widget) is a widget built to show Tree Data
structures.

## Tui-widget-list [Crate](https://crates.io/crates/tui-widget-list) [Docs](https://docs.rs/tui-widget-list) [GitHub](https://github.com/preiter93/tui-widget-list)

[Section titled “Tui-widget-list ”](#tui-widget-list--)

[`tui-widget-list`](https://crates.io/crates/tui-widget-list) is stateful widget list implementation
`List` for Ratatui that allows to work with any list of widgets that implement to the `Listable`
trait.

 [Edit page](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui-website/edit/main/src/content/docs/showcase/third-party-widgets.mdx)

 [Previous Built-in Widgets](/showcase/widgets/) [Next Templates](/templates/)
